Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a misleading screenshot shared on Facebook.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the Twitter account mentioned in the screenshot is the real account of Thailand's pro-democracy protest group, Free Youth.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the tweet in question was not sent from Free Youth's verified Twitter account.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the screenshot is from a fake Twitter account impersonating Free Youth.
Understate: The claim may understate the extent of the issue, as there may be more fake Twitter accounts impersonating Free Youth than the one mentioned in the claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times as it relies on a misleading screenshot and does not provide sufficient evidence to support its assertion.
Exaggerate: There is no evidence of exaggeration in the claim.
